title: In The Sleep of Death
description: People call her the Hellfire Witch. They say she kills with the Evil Eye. But the truth is even stranger ...Outspoken Eastern socialite Lorena Whittaker has agreed to marry the mysterious Diedrick Adalwolf, a cold, doddering old man who claims to be a theology scholar. Soon after the wedding, her dreams shift to premonitions of ghoulish deaths.What she cannot tell is whether Adalowolf is the catalyst or merely a witness.Soon Lorena stands accused of murder and a jittery posse intends to bring her to justice. As she schemes to evade the hangman's noose, she must traverse a world of stolen tribal magic and ancient lore to solve this mystery.One thing is certain -- staying with her husband is not safe. But how can she break free of a man who can enter her mind and read her thoughts?
author: Kimberly van Ginkel
